        Get or create button at ribbon
        Parameters:
        groupName - name of the group of Ribbon
        groupDescription - group description
        title - Title for button
        tooltip - Tooltip for button
        imagePath - path to image of ribbon button
        executeclassname - Class for execution of clicking
        redirectURL - HTTP address to redirect after button was clicked (works only if ececuteclassname is null
